name: RECOTHERM IG™ Fluids
description: RECOTHERM IG™ contains specially formulated inhibitor packages to help prevent corrosion and extend the life of the fluid. Ethylene glycol based fluids are the first choice for heat transfer applications because of their higher heat transfer efficiency and better overall low temperature properties. All RECOTHERM IG™ heat transfer fluids come in concentrate or pre-diluted solutions, are biodegradable and will not concentrate in water systems.
